verses.name: 2 Kings 9:22
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Joram saw Jehu, that he said, Is it peace, Jehu? And he answered, What peace, so long as the whoredoms of thy mother Jezebel and her witchcrafts are so many?

verses.name: 2 Kings 9:23
verses.text: And Joram turned his hands, and fled, and said to Ahaziah, There is treachery, O Ahaziah.

verses.name: 2 Kings 9:24
verses.text: And Jehu drew a bow with his full strength, and smote Jehoram between his arms, and the arrow went out at his heart, and he sunk down in his chariot.
